snippet: As one of the foremost chroniclers of graffiti, Henry Chalfant photographed hundreds of subway cars covered with everything from murals to tiny tags. Now, he is releasing interactive books from his archives.
abstract: As one of the foremost chroniclers of graffiti, Henry Chalfant photographed hundreds of subway cars covered with everything from murals to tiny tags. Now, he is releasing interactive books from his archives.

headline.print_headline: Subway Graffiti in the Digital Age
